column4: anyone have any experience using serial devices on Ubunutu or Linux in general?
I was using it today with a couple of serial connections.  I had to turn on xon/off; after that it worked well.
ttyS0 (or tty0) is windows com1, and ttyS1 (tty1) is windows com2
telnet isn't terribly useful for testing a serial port.  I use minicom, which the package manager can install
